tux:news.p: We (The SuperTux Development Team) have put our heads together, and we are going to try to officially release Milestone 2 sometime in December. We currently are planning on that month, so right now is a crucial time to have people bug testing. If you would like to help with bug testing you can find the latest downloads in the Download section. As always, if you come across a bug ( or what might be one, feel free to report it in our Bug Tracker. If you would like to help us get this release out you can find more information on our contact section.
Whewph, what alot of changes, but here you go. We spent the last few days re-doing the website and updating its info.
The latest release (0.3.5a) Brought the following improvements over earlier versions:

ul.li: move to SDL2 for graphics rendering
new badguys: iceflame, ghostflame, livefire, goldbomb, smartblock
support for horizontal gradients in levels (add (direction "vertical|horizontal") to your level)

Yay! 3 weeks after our 0.3.5 release we bring you release 0.3.5a, which fixes a ton of bugs and we added a 64 bit Windows installer!! As always, if you run into bugs, or would like to join us in developing this game, you can find us on Github.
